archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Warren Chappell Papers,
1870-1994
did.physdesc: ca. 3,300 items (18 Hollinger boxes and seven oversize boxes, ca. 18.5 linear shelf feet)
did.abstract: The collection, 1870-1994, consists chiefly of Warren Chappell's illustrations, artwork, sketches and drawings; personal and professional correspondence; and articles, catalogs and photographs.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Warren Chappell Papers, 1870-1994, Accession #10204-av, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This material was transferred from the Rare Books Division to the Manuscripts Division on December 3, 1996.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This addition to the papers of American book illustrator and artist, Warren Chappell (1904-1991) consists of ca. 3,300 items, ca. 1870-1994, chiefly Chappell's illustrations and artwork for books, dust jackets, magazines, Book-of-the-Month Club announcements, keepsakes, bookplates, and Christmas card designs; and individual sketches and drawings by Chappell and other artists (including some pre-twentieth century artists), but also including personal and professional correspondence; printed material; some photographs; articles; talks and speeches by Chappell; exhibition catalogs featuring Chappell; reviews and notices for books illustrated or written by Chappell; examples of various typefaces; political cartoons; and various topical files. Also present are some manuscripts and drawings by Chappell's grandfather, John Taylor Chappell (1845-1915), and Samuel Michael Chappell.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p:
Series I: Topical & Miscellaneous Files
Subseries A: Artwork by Chappell & Other Artists (Boxes 1-2; Oversize Boxes N-1, S-34, S-35)
Subseries B: Topical & Miscellaneous Files (Boxes 3-8; Oversize Boxes N-1, )
Subseries C: Correspondence (Boxes 8-10)
Series II: Artwork & Illustrations by Warren Chappell for Books, arranged by book title (Boxes 11-18; Oversize Boxes S-32, S-33, S-35)

scopecontent.p: Includes: Art Students' League Poster for the Fiftieth Anniversary Exhibition by Allen Lewis; Windrose Zur Landkarte von DeutschlandPoster by Warren Chappell and Berthold L. Wolpe; Printed illustration by Fritz Kredel from Soldiers of the American Army 1775-1941; Littera Scripta Manet Posters printed at the Acorn Press; Poster advertising Warren Chappell and The Frederic W. Goudy Distinguished Lecture in Typography For 1970; Poster by Andrew Hoyem "In the Beginning/Was the Word/The Word Was God/In Him Was Life; American Typecasting Fellowship Certificate; Poster advertising "University of San Francisco Symposium XIX Egypt People of the Sun"; Exhibition Poster "Warren Chappell Artist and Artificer in the Twentieth-Century Book World."
